Question & Options:
Which statements are true regarding the casting and character of Ofelia in *Pan's Labyrinth*?
Options:
A. a) Del Toro cast Ivana Baquero after discovering her accidentally.
B. b) Ivana Baquero portrayed the character Ofelia / Princess Moanna.
C. c) Ivana Baquero was nervous about playing the role.
D. d) Ofelia believed she was the reincarnation of a princess from the underworld.
Correct Answer: a) Del Toro cast Ivana Baquero after discovering her accidentally., b) Ivana Baquero portrayed the character Ofelia / Princess Moanna., d) Ofelia believed she was the reincarnation of a princess from the underworld.
